name: Missing Cats: Please Help!
description:
Get a group of missing cats back to their owner in this short, charming platformer. Made for Metroidvania Month 18.

Controls:

Z - Jump
X - Dash
SPACE - Interact

Credits:

Coding by KKairos
Art and Graphics by Zephyr
Music by ManEatingLion

Testing by Wervyn, AMSantos, Signal, and E_Megas.

External assets: Alice Opensource Font: https://github.com/cyrealtype/Alice . License in OFL_for_Alice_Font.txt.

Version 0.9.6 (released during MVM 18 bugfix day) has:

* An icon! Yay!
* One very weird save bug fixed or patched (hopefully, haha!)
* Minor adjustments/bugfixes
* A couple other graphical adjustments/fixes
* A few other things to bring down size
* A couple of fixes to a weird save-data damage bug and removing a "room" that looks like it should be accessible but isn't. Completionists of the world, we care about your sanity!
